title: How do you report someone when youre not in end game screen...
body:
had a guy play a game with me and was flaming me afterwards while i was in que, he started telling me he bought the account so he doesnt care if he loses etc etc...

howcome there isnt a way to report someone outside of end of game lobby?

replies.body: You can't. Hopefully they can add a feature that allows you to report a person even after you exit the after game screen.

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=jWdffAaH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-29T03:46:31.754+0000)
>
> You can't. Hopefully they can add a feature that allows you to report a person even after you exit the after game screen.

damn, its almost as if they dont care XD

You can, you just have to [submit it in a ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (Just submit it under the generic questions categories). They don't like to encourage it because end game reporting is by far the most effective way to get people punished because of the way it reviews/marks accounts, however, obviously you can't always report in post game (dodge in champ select, harassment via private message etc) in which case submit a ticket and they will review the case.

Please be aware though that player support will not under any circumstances disclose any information about another player to you, so you'll get back a generic "thanks for your report sorry we can't tell you anything because privacy".
what if i have someone trying to scam me and take my account how do i report him

Same way, report them through a support ticket. If the scammer is messaging you privately, then quite often such accounts are stolen as well so it's always a good idea to bring it to supports attention.
Support ticket can work with that especially if you provide screen shots of the chat as evidence...
